description: The GLOCK 32 Gen4, in .357, introduces revolutionary design changes to the pistol that offers a unique combination of versatility, convincing ballistics, optimum carry comfort, and the GLOCK pistol reliability. The Modular Back Strap design lets you instantly customize its grip to adapt to an individual shooter's hand size. The surface of the frame employs the new scientifically designed, real-world-tested, Gen4 rough textured technology. Internally, the new GLOCK dual recoil spring assembly substantially increases the life of the system. A reversible enlarged magazine catch, changeable in seconds, accommodates left or right-handed operators. The G32 Gen4 retains the GLOCK accessory rail for your attachments.
title: Glock 32 Gen4

 View Full Version : Equity partner for approved residential subdivisions
 GuyW
09-02-2009, 6:39 PM
I have been working on a couple of APPROVED subdivisions (TMs) in the Fallbrook area. 
 The owner is looking for an equity partner.
 If anyone is interested, please PM me. 
 The projects are 1+ acre rural residential lots.
 I have inside knowledge on another approved residential project, in Riverside County, as well
 These projects all have recently-approved Tentative Maps.
 PS, I'm always looking for folks who might need civil engineering or land surveying services
 Rob454
09-11-2009, 4:28 PM
You're looking to build houses in this economy? AND make a profit?
 GuyW
09-25-2009, 5:55 PM
You're looking to build houses in this economy? AND make a profit?
 1. No, the coming economy
 2. Residential subs don't have to involve house construction - it can be a lot sales program...
